# Battlefield Illumination (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Light Spells|light]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[4th Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Area:** 80-ft.-radius cylinder, 40 ft. high

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Heroes of Battle (WotC), pg. 125

When you cast *battlefield illumination,* a soft light illuminates the area. This effect improves the illumination in the area by one category (from darkness to shadowy, or from shadowy to bright light). It does not stack with other magical light effects.

Unlike other spells with the light descriptor, *battlefield illumination* counters and dispels *[[Early Twilight (Spell)|early twilight]]* darkness spells.
